feature.title: Why Choose This Text Adventure Game
feature.subtitle: Highly customizable text adventure, create your own world!

first.title: Endless Possibilities
first.description: By customizing scenes and choice effects, players can create unique storylines. Every choice will influence future developments, bringing endless exploration and possibilities.

second.title: Diverse Effects
second.description: The game supports various visual effects, such as color, font size, and blur, allowing you to adjust the atmosphere based on the story context, making it more vivid and immersive.

third.title: Simple and Easy to Use
third.description: Even without programming experience, you can easily create a text adventure game using simple configuration tools. No coding required, allowing players to unleash their creativity and design unique adventure stories.

fourth.title: Multilingual Support
fourth.description: Supports multiple language switches, enabling your game to reach a broader global audience. Through simple configurations, different language versions can be implemented, breaking language barriers and allowing more people to experience your creation.
